Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.network.messages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionsListMsg
    Class for sending to the client a list of actions that can be performed
    CardsListMsg
    Class for sending to the client a list of cards that can be selected
    CellListMsg
    Class for a send to the client a list of cell generated by the server
    CreatedMsg
    Class used to notify the client that a new room has been created
    CreateMsg
    Class used to pass information to the server for creating a new room
    JoinMsg
    Class used by the client to join a game providing the selected name
    Message
    Class for general message, server-client-server
    OptionsListMsg
    Class for sending to the client a list of build options that can be selected
    OtherLostMsg
    Message used to notify clients that a player has lost but the game can continue
    PlayerInfoMsg
    Class used by the client to send initialization information
    RequestInfoMsg
    Class used by the server to notify the user about the colors and positions that a user can select
    SelectActionMsg
    Class used to send to the server the selected action
    SelectCardMsg
    Class used to send to the server the selected card
    SelectCellMsg
    Class for send to server a selected cell generally used for request a list of possible move after choosing a worker
    SelectOptionMsg
    Class used to send to the server the selected build option
    SelectWorkerMsg
    Class used to send to the server the selected worker to be used in the current turn
    UpdateBoardMsg
    Class for send a board to draw from server to client
    WorkersListMsg
    Class for sending to the client a list of workers that can be selected
    YourCardMsg
    Class used to send to the the player the assigned card
